name: medi-connect-backend
description: MediConnect Backend - Serverless Architecture on AWS

scripts.build: npm run build:prisma && npm run build:ts && npm run build:layers
scripts.deploy: npm run package && npm run upload && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation/template.yaml --stack-name medi-connect-backend --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Stage=dev
